reviewText: Gene Wilder and Richard Pryor are wonderful together. They will make you laugh. The DVD contains 'See No Evil, Hear No Evil' that will make you laugh out loud. The scene with the two of them in the police station is worth the price of the DVD all by itself.
Title: Richard Pryor / Gene Wilder Triple Feature (Stir Crazy / See No Evil, Hear No Evil / Another You)

reviewText: these r great classics  nice they came triple set what a rare find  my boyfriend was pleased bought for a gift
Title: Richard Pryor / Gene Wilder Triple Feature (Stir Crazy / See No Evil, Hear No Evil / Another You)

reviewText: I've seen these movies numerous times, and they are so funny!!!  I had to buy this for my 76 year old Uncle for his birthday and he is truly enjoying them.
Title: Richard Pryor / Gene Wilder Triple Feature (Stir Crazy / See No Evil, Hear No Evil / Another You)

reviewText: The package came with no issues. I'm grateful for that. When I saw these movies with my uncle when I was a kid, I thought it was good stuff. So basically, I'm setting out to but to buy Richard Pryors movies to add to a collection of movies I'm starting. I always felt Richard and Gene Wilder were great together.
Title: Richard Pryor / Gene Wilder Triple Feature (Stir Crazy / See No Evil, Hear No Evil / Another You)

reviewText: Good old movies. Love the old comedies.  Like that they are all in a set together. And the price for the set is cheaper than separately.  Good clean clear copies.
Title: Richard Pryor / Gene Wilder Triple Feature (Stir Crazy / See No Evil, Hear No Evil / Another You)

reviewText: you must buy this these are 3 of the funniest movies ever madepryor/wilder duo is scheer perfection nonstop laughs uterly amazing movies what more can be said
Title: Richard Pryor / Gene Wilder Triple Feature (Stir Crazy / See No Evil, Hear No Evil / Another You)

reviewText: EXCELLENT MOVIE - IT WAS DELIVERED ON TIME IN PERFECT CONDITION MADE ME REMINICE TO MY YOUTH.  AWESOME MOVIE.  THE BEST - LOVE ME SOME RICHARD PRYOR AND HIM AND GENE WILDER ARE AN AWESOME PAIR - COMICAL ALWAYS...
Title: Richard Pryor / Gene Wilder Triple Feature (Stir Crazy / See No Evil, Hear No Evil / Another You)
